title: Fastest Lap
description: Pretty self-explanatory. Who gets the fastest lap?

title: Most exciting team
description: This isn't the 'best' team, but is instead the team you think put on the best show throughout the entire season

title: Best of the Slowest
description: Best driver of the slowest of the pack

title: Pastor Maldonado award
description: Which driver is going to be involved in the most incidents. It's the 'always in the wrong place at the wrong time' award

title: First Out
description: Which driver is going to be the first one out of the race. They had to have started the race however, doesn't count if they don't make it to the start of the race.

title: Biggest Surprise (Driver edition)
description: What driver do you think will be the biggest surpise of the season. This could be in a good or bad way.

title: Fastest Pit
description: Which driver is going to have the fastest pit stop of the race

title: Best radio
description: Which driver had the best radio message

title: Most exciting driver
description: Which driver do you think will be the most exciting, or best to watch

title: Biggest Surprise (Team edition)
description: What team do you think will be the biggest surpise of the season. This could be in a good or bad way.
